about.me: Proudly and professionally run by Beau & Em of TeamRetro.com.au. Blockchain enthusiasts from Brisbane, Australia with an extensive background in IT and Marketing, and of course huge lovers of Cardano.
about.company: Our pool margin is competitively set to 2% not only to cover running costs but to support two charities who are very close to our hearts. 50% of these profits will be donated to Cure Cancer AU and the Sony Foundation. By supporting and donating to both of these charities, we as a pool will be helping raise funds for life-saving cancer research as well as funding emergency accommodation for regional youth cancer patients who must travel to the city for life saving treatment.
